    Blog Update

    less than 1 minute read

    The reason I've been posting random musings recently is threefold:

    1. I was preparing for college/am now at college, which has stymied temporarily the amount of time I have been able to put into this.
    2. I've recently been accepted on to the Students for Liberty blogging team, and
    3. I've also been accepted on to the college newspaper, both of which are taking my focus.

    These are why I haven't posted anything substantial. Posts will be coming soon as the posts I've submitted go up on the SFL website in September(which I'll post simultaneously here), but till then I will be lacking some material.

    Sincerely,

    -Elias
